publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3341 Bill Aitken: Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War—That the Parliament notes that the Barnado’s Parliament Tug of War Competition, held in Holyrood Park on Thursday 15 September 2005, helped raise £2,750 for the charity; congratulates the members and staff of the Scottish Executive, the Green, SNP and Liberal Democrat parties, The Scotsman, the BBC, the Scottish Conservatives and the other teams for their sterling efforts and great commitment; further congratulates Barnado’s for all the hard work which went into organising such an enjoyable event and HBOS for its generous support, and hopes that next year’s event will be even more successful, with teams from all parties taking part.
S2M-3341 Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War (lodged on 26 September 2005) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3341 Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War (lodged on 26 September 2005) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-3341 Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War (lodged on 26 September 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-3341 Bill Aitken: Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War—That the Parliament notes that the Barnado’s Parliament Tug of War Competition, held in Holyrood Park on Thursday 15 September 2005, helped raise £2,750 for the charity; congratulates the members and staff of the Scottish Executive, the Green, SNP and Liberal Democrat parties, The Scotsman, the BBC, the Scottish Conservatives and the other teams for their sterling efforts and great commitment; further congratulates Barnado’s for all the hard work which went into organising such an enjoyable event and HBOS for its generous support, and hopes that next year’s event will be even more successful, with teams from all parties taking part. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson R, Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie, Mr David Davidson, Mr Brian Monteith
S2M-3341 Barnardo’s/HBOS Tug of War (lodged on 26 September 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
